programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: In Argentina's breathtaking, yet imposing wilderness, every day is a fight for survival. The terrain is rugged and parched. The air is thin. The weather can change in an instant. programme.title: Europe's New Wild

programme.title: Wild Central America
programme.desc: Nigel Marven explores the stunningly beautiful country of Guatemala, uncovering a wealth of wildlife, dramatic scenery and ancient Maya history along the way. There are Quetzals, jays and orchids in the cloud forests and venomous lizards in the arid interior.

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: During the frigid Michigan winter, cases ranging from simple procedures to horribly injured limbs sweep Pol Veterinary Services. Dr. Pol and the PVS vets bring their splints, glue, sutures, and expertise to treat their wide variety of patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: From lumps and bumps to geckos and goats, Doc and the vets treat ‚Äòem all! programme.title: Deadly Instincts
programme.desc: How do different animals go about the business of parenting, and what drives some to stick around, others to walk away? It's all about genetic heritage - in this episode we trace the tactics, trials and tribulations of a vast array of different species in their fight to further their line..

programme.title: Deadly Instincts
programme.desc: The law of the wild is kill, or be killed - but how do different creatures execute this most grisly of tasks? From solo slayers like tigers, who rely on stealth, speed and strength, to team players like orca, who use their intelligence to work together and kill against the odds, this is a new and unique exploration of how animals kill.

programme.title: Deadly Instincts
programme.desc: Beyond the 50/50 coin toss of fight or flight, survival really is a numbers game. Your threats stack up: primed predators, child killers, cruel nature. Whether through courage, wisdom, strength, or by leveraging super-powers, the survivors make it - against all odds..

programme.title: Deadly Instincts
programme.desc: In the animal world, mating is big business. It's key to passing on genes, and ultimately species survival. These are the stories of dedication, intimacy and ruthlessness that make up the game of love. The stakes are high, and winning is everything..

programme.title: Deadly Instincts
programme.desc: For any animal, growing up is tough. Young life is riddled with seminal moments and momentous mistakes. A baby elephant gets kicked around by males from her family, and discovered the perils associated with keeping up with the herd when your mum is inexperienced.
